snippet: A large explosive device was detonated against an Israeli Army vehicle patrolling the Israel-Lebanon border on Friday, and the Israeli military responded with tank and artillery fire.
abstract: Large explosive device is detonated against an Israeli Army vehicle patrolling the Israel-Lebanon border, and Israeli military responds with tank and artillery fire.
lead_paragraph: A large explosive device was detonated against an Israeli Army vehicle patrolling the Israel-Lebanon border on Friday, and the Israeli military responded with tank and artillery fire.

headline.main: Israel: Military Fires Into Lebanon After Border Blast
headline.print_headline: Israel: Military Fires Into Lebanon After Border Blast
